collection_holder_name: Arts Library, Special Collections, University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA)
pageContext.collection_title: Pinky Herman Collection of Columns Written for Television Industry Newspapers
pageContext.collection_description: Contains columns published in the entertainment trade papers, including "Television Today," "Motion Picture Daily" and "Radio/TV Daily." The columns cover projects and industry professionals from 1943-1950 and 1954-1971.
